member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.JobController.Getjobs
member.summary: Get All the Jobs by the path GET /api/job

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.JobController.GetJob(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get one job by id with the path GET /api/job/{id}

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.JobController.PutJobItem(WebAPI.Models.Job)
member.summary: Update the Job by the path PUT /api/job/ and the body with a json with the job
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT /api/job/ { "idJob": 1, "jobName": "Architect test", "jobTitle": "Data Architect Coordinator", "jobDescription": "Define The RoadMap of SaonGroup for DB and Analytics - Test", "createdAt": "2020-06-03", "expiresAt": "2020-08-02" }

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.JobController.CreateJob(WebAPI.Models.Job)
member.summary: Create a Job by the path POST /api/job and the json with the job object
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /api/job { "idJob": 10, "jobName": "Architect test", "jobTitle": "Data Architect Coordinator", "jobDescription": "Define The RoadMap of SaonGroup for DB and Analytics - Test", "createdAt": "2020-06-03", "expiresAt": "2020-08-02" }

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.JobController.DeleteJob(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a Job by the path DELETE /api/job and the json with the job object
